channel.title: Killcount for NPCs
channel.description:
I need killcount for npc everything i try ends up not working and its pissing me off. i have asked 2 people and both of them were helpfull but it didnt work so i need help :P I am using Project 16 =\
Also this is for barrows all i need is the dang killcount and it will be exactly as runescape's[br][size=1]Posted on: March 16, 2007, 09:54:05 AM[/size][hr]well so much for getting help -.-

item.title: Killcount for NPCs
item.dc:creator: @junkyNL junkyNL
item.description:
@junkyNL wrote:

well tell me than :P…

i can’t get it work
so help me?

system79 helpd me with making this… 99% credits to system79

search for public boolean attacknpc

under it stands ResetAttackNPC();

under it add

int npckills = npckills+1;

under writeplayers add somewhere this

sendFrame126("@whi@NPCs killed: "+npckills, 13598);

than add this somewhere …

int npckills = npckills;
but it gives errors about intiliazing or something any help?

Read full topic

item.title: Killcount for NPCs
item.dc:creator: @billygotshot billygotshot
item.description:
@billygotshot wrote:

[quote=“i loot i, post:4, topic:68311”]lol ive made a monster mini game with poitns 50 points to go to next portal u get point when the npc died here is what i have in npchandler don’t gonna tell more the rest is up to u
this also workz for right slayer xp as in runescape ( ive got it )

if(npcs[NPCID].npcType == 82) { ItemHandler.addItem(Item.randomsmoke(), npcs[NPCID].absX, npcs[NPCID].absY, 1, GetNpcKiller(NPCID), false); int Player = npcs[NPCID].StartKilling; client ppl = (client) server.playerHandler.players[Player]; ppl.barrowsgame += 1; }

u need to add some things in client but its easy so i hope it workz it does for me

using project satan[/quote]

thanks man worked perfectly

Read full topic

if(npcs[NPCID].npcType == 82) { ItemHandler.addItem(Item.randomsmoke(), npcs[NPCID].absX, npcs[NPCID].absY, 1, GetNpcKiller(NPCID), false); int Player = npcs[NPCID].StartKilling; client ppl = (client) server.playerHandler.players[Player]; ppl.barrowsgame += 1; }

u need to add some things in client but its easy so i hope it workz it does for me

using project satan
